text: Bayothi babebathathu owenise wabo kwakuyinja yabo futhi (abanye) bayothi bebeyisihlanu owesithupha wabo kwakwiyinja yaboâ€“kungukuqagela ngokungabonwayo futhi (abanye) bathi babeyisikhombisa owesishiyagalombili wabo kwakuyinja yabo ithi iNkosi yami yazi kabanzi ngesibalo sabo akekho obaziyo ngaphandle kwabambalwa ngakho-ke ungabi nempikiswano ngabo ngaphandle kwempikiswano enobufakazi obucacile futhi ungabuzi ngisho noyedwa wabo ngabo
